an1.31:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yam evam adantam mahato anatthaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, cittam.
an1.31:1.2: Cittam, bhikkhave, adantam mahato anatthaya samvattati”ti.
an1.32:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yam evam dantam mahato atthaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, cittam.
an1.32:1.2: Cittam, bhikkhave, dantam mahato atthaya samvattati”ti.
an1.33:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yam evam aguttam mahato anatthaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, cittam.
an1.33:1.2: Cittam, bhikkhave, aguttam mahato anatthaya samvattati”ti.
an1.34:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yam evam guttam mahato atthaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, cittam.
an1.34:1.2: Cittam, bhikkhave, guttam mahato atthaya samvattati”ti.
an1.35:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yam evam arakkhitam mahato anatthaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, cittam.
an1.35:1.2: Cittam, bhikkhave, arakkhitam mahato anatthaya samvattati”ti.
an1.36:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yam evam rakkhitam mahato atthaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, cittam.
an1.36:1.2: Cittam, bhikkhave, rakkhitam mahato atthaya samvattati”ti.
an1.37:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yam evam asamvutam mahato anatthaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, cittam.
an1.37:1.2: Cittam, bhikkhave, asamvutam mahato anatthaya samvattati”ti.
an1.38:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yam evam samvutam mahato atthaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, cittam.
an1.38:1.2: Cittam, bhikkhave, samvutam mahato atthaya samvattati”ti.
an1.39:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yam evam adantam aguttam arakkhitam asamvutam mahato anatthaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, cittam.
an1.39:1.2: Cittam, bhikkhave, adantam aguttam arakkhitam asamvutam mahato anatthaya samvattati”ti.
an1.40:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yam evam dantam guttam rakkhitam samvutam mahato atthaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, cittam.
an1.40:1.2: Cittam, bhikkhave, dantam guttam rakkhitam samvutam mahato atthaya samvattati”ti.
